failure of Microsoft's hostile takeover bid for Yahoo has caused the Wall Street Journal to publish a report calling for a sell-off of the company's stock. In a hard-hitting opinion piece, Brett Arends writes: Now is an excellent opportunity to sell any Microsoft stock you have left.
